mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RoomInfo(ROOMCODE, hotelcode, ROOMTYPECODE, ROOMNUM, HCOUNT, price, information, notice, CANCEL_NOTICE) VALUES(#{roomCode}, #{hotelCode}, #{roomtypeCode}, #{roomNum}, #{hCount}, #{price}, #{information, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{notice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancel_notice, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO roomfile(fileCode, roomCode, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES(ROOMFILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{roomCode}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT roomName,roomCode, roomNum, hCount, price FROM roomInfo r JOIN ROOMTYPE t ON r.roomtypecode=t.roomtypecode ORDER BY roomnum ASC
